raw_text: FERNANDO – OLIVER ANNESLY – (Former Accountant,​ State Distilleries Corporation /​ Internal Auditor,​ King Faisal Specialist Hospital,​ Saudi Arabia),​ passed away. Beloved husband of Kanthi,​ loving father of Angella Kalashini,​ father-in-law of Luqman,​ much loved grandfather of Joy & Joshua (Australia),​ loving son of late Nelson and Irene Fernando (Mattakkuliya),​ brother of Oreen,​ late Jeniview and Onereen,​ brother-in-law of Irvine Balasooriya and late Chullakantha Balasuriya. Remains will lie at Mahinda Funeral Parlour,​ Mount Lavinia from Friday,​ the 15th from 10.30 a.m. until 8.00 p.m. Saturday from 10.00 a.m. onwards. Funeral Service will be on Saturday,​ 16th September at The Parlour at 3.00 p.m. and cortege will leave for burial at 3.30 p.m. for Mount Lavinia Cemetery.058126

RODRIGO – CLIFFORD TISSA (CT) – Beloved husband of Hiranthie,​ loving father of Chryshan and Rochelle,​ loving father-in-law of Suren and Natasha,​ adored grandfather of Alicia,​ Arielle and Alayna. Beloved son of Hector and Grace Rodrigo (deceased),​ loving brother of Lorna (deceased),​ Cecil,​ Dawn,​ Nihal,​ Sunil (deceased),​ Malini,​ Jeanne,​ Kanthi,​ Rohini,​ Mohan and Cheryl. Called to eternal rest on 12th September 2023. Remains lie at “The Restpect Home” by Jayaratne’s,​ 483,​ Bauddhaloka Mawatha,​ Colombo 08,​ from Thursday,​ the 14th,​ 9 a.m. – 10 p.m. and on Friday,​ the 15th,​ 9 a.m. onwards. On Friday,​ service and prayers at 3 p.m. Cortege leaves the Parlour at 3.30 p.m. for burial at the General Cemetery,​ Borella (Anglican Section).058014

WELIWITA – THUSITHA – Beloved wife of late Lion Prabha Chandra Weliwita,​ mother of Dhananjaya (USA) and Sidath,​ mother-in-law of Dr Savithri Muthukuda (USA) and Gayani Gankanda,​ grandmother of Shenali (USA),​ Mayashi and Shanaal,​ passed away peacefully. Remains lie at residence Kendaliyaddapaluwa,​ Ganemulla. Cremation will take place at 4 p.m. on Thursday,​ 14th September 2023 at Kendaliyaddapaluwa,​ Ganemulla.058082

WIJESURIYA – SOMA (12th September 1942 – 12th September 2023). Wife of late Nandasena Wijesuriya,​ beloved mother of Chaminda,​ Nalaka & Lasanthi,​ loving sister of late Sumanadasa Perera,​ late Chandrasiri Perera,​ late Nandasiri Perera,​ late Jayanthi Perera,​ Premasiri Perera,​ Kanthi Perera & Kumarasiri Perera,​ passed away on 12th September 2023. Cortege leaves the Funeral Parlour No. 591,​ Galle Road,​ Mount Lavinia on 14th September at 4 p.m. for Cremation at Mount Lavinia Cemetery.058220
